title: Prada logo
content:
Hey does anyone know the font used for the Prada logo, and can it be purchased or used. or is has it been exclusivly designed for prada.   
   
Much appriciated   
   
   
   
 ![prada logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20120414234445im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/33698.gif)
author: tariqchau

comments.content:
My guess: Custom   
   
But Engravers Bold will get you close   
   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/engravers-roman/bold/testdrive.html?s=PRADA&p=72](http://web.archive.org/web/20120414234445/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/engravers-roman/bold/testdrive.html?s=PRADA&p=72)
We've discussed this logo [before](http://web.archive.org/web/20120414234445/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/4100/2997.html). Use the search.
